short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do your own car rental market research, gain insights and make smarter decisions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to know what cars are most profitable? Planning to start your business on Turo? Meet Raptor Explorer, the first Chrome extension for Turo car rental market analytics. Gather real-time data from the API and get the performance of other listings. With Raptor, you can calculate which cars have the best return on investment and make smarter financial decisions. 

Get data for each listing on Turo:
✔ How long car has been listed
✔ Owner's plan
✔ Bookings in Selected Date Range (NEW!)
✔ Expected Gross Income in Selected Date Range (NEW!)"

All information provided in one spreadsheet table:
Location, Type, Make, Model, Year, Color, Trim, Features; Date of Listing Creation, Days on Turo, Trips, Average $ per Day, Max Daily Distance, Weekly & Monthly Discounts, Custom Date Range Columns for Listing Income Calculation, Host Plan, Filtering by Host ID; Favorites, Reviews and Ratings for Each Vehicle; Link to Each Listing.

Save real-time data from API from your desired area in 3 steps:
1. Install the extension
2. Open search page and follow instructions
3. Export listings to spreadsheet

Raptor Explorer is incredibly user-friendly and easy to install. Do your own car rental market research: save listings in bulk and export them to a spreadsheet. Extension is super helpful if you are a numbers person.

See how other listings are performing, find successful patterns, and build a growing and sustainable business.

Upgrade to Pro to have unlimited data scraping and export to spreadsheets. If you need support, don't hesitate to contact us at support@raptorexplorer.com.
For updates and news visit raptorexplorer.com.

Tasiev LLC d/b/a Raptor Explorer is not affiliated with Turo Inc. The name “Turo” is a registered trademark of Turo Inc.
